captions.text: Ro: Hey guys, it's Ro, and I've got my sister Mo here today
Mo: Hello! Ro: Yeah, today we are gonna be playing the game we got so many requests for, Heads Up!

Mo: Yeah, it's on the app store, so you can download it on whatever device you have.
Ro: Yes, I'm so excited! So, the rules of the game, you have 1 minute to guess as many correct answers as possible.
Ro: And you play together as a team, you can always play with more people, but you always need at least 2 people.
Ro: We are gonna do our best to get as many correct answers as possible.
Ro: And there are different categories to choose from, so let's look at the categories.
Mo: You want to choose the first one? Ro: OK, superstars, act it... Animals! I love animals!
Ro: Let's do some animals! Mo: Let's do it!
Ro: Get your teammate to guess the animal on the card without saying any part of the animal name on the card.
Ro: And without rhyming! Let's play!
